attributes.action: Extend the 222 bus route to Tooting
attributes.background: Extending the 222 to Tooting will bring joy to an otherwise dull London and add more opportunities to the area

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Bus services in London are run by TfL, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
